statements: DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND email_campaign_id = '87654321-1234-4321-5678-1234567890AB';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Click' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND email = 'example@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id=101 AND campaign_id=201;
